document.full_text: the sudanese army invaded the flashpoint town of abyei over the weekend, alarming western and united nations diplomats who warned sunday that it could lead to war.
document.title: warnings of all-out war in fight over sudan town
lines_and_colors: the sudanese army invaded the flashpoint town of abyei over the weekend, alarming western and united nations diplomats who warned sunday that it could lead to war.
